alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 10:39PM AKDT until March 16 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Snow Followed by Heavy Rain for Southeast Alaska... .Snow arrives to the central and northern Panhandle late Tuesday night through Thursday. Confidence is increasing that the far northern Panhandle, including Haines and Skagway, will see heavy snow while warming temperatures change snow over to rain for the Icy Strait Corridor. Precipitation is still expected to start as snow along the Icy Strait Corridor, but a general 2 to 4 inches is expected as a change to rain should limit any significant accumulations. As for Yakutat, the main plume of moisture is expected to develop to the east limiting snow accumulations. That being said, by Thursday evening, the main plume of moisture is expected to shift to west, increasing the possibility for Yakutat to see significant snow accumulations. Yakutat`s snow accumulations will be extremely dependent on where the plume of moisture develops so this trend will be monitored closely throughout this event. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow followed by heavy rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 10 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates are expected Wednesday night. A transition to heavy rain near sea level is expected by Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
